content: HiKR GROUND0 is a comprehensive entertainment venue located in Seoul, South Korea, which integrates shopping, dining, entertainment, culture and other functions. HiKR GROUND0 has multiple theme areas, each with different characteristics and styles. Among them, the most popular is the "K-POP theme area", which shows the development of Korean pop music and cultural connotations, as well as many K-POP stars' surrounding products and souvenirs. In addition, HiKR GROUND0 has multiple restaurants and cafes, offering a variety of cuisines and drinks. Among them, the most popular is the "Korean Traditional Food District", which offers a variety of authentic Korean traditional cuisines such as barbecue, kimchi, stone pot bibimbap and so on. In short, HiKR GROUND0 is a place worth visiting, whether it is K-POP fans or ordinary tourists, you can find what you like here.

Chonglimen is the largest of Seoul's four gates. The lower end of the gate is a stone-built gateway and the upper end is a double wooden city building. Chonglimen is the oldest wooden structure in Seoul. During the period of the merger of Japan and South Korea, the city wall was demolished in 1907 to cooperate with urban reconstruction. During the Korean War, the gate was damaged by fire and a major restoration project was completed in 1961 on May 14, 1963.

Chongli Gate is South Korea's No. 1 "national treasure", the largest of Seoul's gates, known by the United Nations as the gate of South Korea. Chongli Gate is a city gate in Seoul, South Korea, and one of Seoul's landmarks. Chongli Gate dates back to the Korean dynasty and was the main gate of Seoul. Now, Chongli Gate has become an important cultural heritage in South Korea, attracting many tourists to visit. The architecture of Chonglimen is unique, with traditional Korean architectural style, and stands in stark contrast to the modern architecture surrounding it. On Chonglimen Square, there are many sculptures and monuments that showcase the history and culture of Korea. In addition, Chonglimen is an important venue for Korean political and cultural activities, often holding various concerts, art exhibitions and other activities. In short, Chonglimen is a good place to understand Korean history and culture, and a good place to feel the modern atmosphere of Korea.

Beiyue SKYWAY is a famous South Korean attraction that connects Seoul's Nanshan and Beiyue Mountains and is a 1778-meter-long aerial cableway. Take Beiyue SKYWAY to enjoy the beautiful city scenery of Seoul, including Nanshan Tower, Han River, Seoul Tower and other famous attractions. In addition, Beiyue SKYWAY offers a unique experience for visitors to feel the feeling of walking in the air. In addition to the viewing, Beiyue SKYWAY also has an observation deck where visitors can enjoy a wider view. There is also a restaurant and a souvenir shop on the viewing platform where visitors can taste food and buy souvenirs. In short, Beiyue SKYWAY is a great place to visit, whether it is to enjoy the scenery or experience the air walk, let visitors feel the unique charm of Seoul.
